name: Lost gems: Ultimate 3D sokoban puzzle
description:
Lost gems: Ultimate sokoban is a remake version of classic computer puzzle game like a sokoban.
Your goal is to push and merge gems.
It is not always as easy as it looks like, taking into account that you cannot pull gems nor walk over them. You can push only one gems or other blocks at a time.
Play 60+ levels.

Attention
After testing on mobile devices, it became known that only 1 out of 100 completed level 10.Challenge your brain! Good luck!

Features:
- contains 60+ levels which equals to few hours of fun
- different difficulties from lite to very hard
- intuitive controls
- hint system help yours solve hard level
- all levels are proved to be solvable
- simple and clean interface free of unnecessary distractions
- more 8 new mechanics, include:
    bombs
    magnet
    "pusher mekhanism"
    turret
    fall platform
    "eye bot"
    and more
